Articles.Content:
How do I save-edit what tier the KSC buildings are?

Edited December 20, 2014 by Engineer Of Stuff
Clarification

How do I edit what tier the KSC buildings are?

Edit save files to change them? Or do you mean an in-game way to change/upgrade/downgrade?

If you're talking about save files, then look for the ScenarioUpgradeableFacilities. the numbers seem to be fractions though (I have some tier 1 and tier 2 buildings, my save says 0 for tier 1, 0.5 for tier 2).
